PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 The UV - visible absorption spectra , optical band - gaps , and HOMO / LUMO energy levels of the polymers are summarized in Table 2.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| UV - visible absorption spectra |
| optical band - gaps |
| HOMO/LUMO energy levels |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that clearly refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| optical band-gaps |
| HOMO/LUMO energy levels |

The entity "UV-visible absorption spectra" is not a material property, but rather a characteristic of the material's interaction with light. Therefore, it is not included in the list of valid entities.
